title: Data loss during migration
description: Risk of data corruption or loss during the migration process if not properly validated

title: Performance degradation post-migration
description: New cloud infrastructure may not perform as expected under production load

title: Legacy data is complete and accurate
description: Assuming that all legacy data is properly documented and accurate

title: Cloud infrastructure will scale automatically
description: Assuming cloud provider's auto-scaling will handle load increases

title: Missing documentation for legacy system
description: Some legacy system components lack proper documentation

title: Resource availability constraint
description: Key SME only available part-time for migration support

title: Selected PostgreSQL for new database
description: Decided to use PostgreSQL instead of MySQL for better JSON support and performance

title: Phased migration approach
description: Will migrate in phases starting with non-critical data, then critical systems
